text: Legend Library is an educational app
that's focused on supporting K

through fourth grade students
reading comprehension. In a
matter of minutes
students are able to use this AI product

to really bring a storybook
of their choice to life,
and it opens the doors for students
to just click a few buttons
and create a story

that they had in their
mind and bring it to life.
We really stress the accuracy

of these images when students
create these storybooks
and Stability

AI's products help to create
these rich illustrations
and also reduces nonsensical text in
our storybooks.

We also really emphasize
safety and reliability
and Stable Diffusion has
provided all of those for our product.
AWS has supported our company

to implement safe practices
with AI by working closely
with our engineers.
We've worked with AWS
and Stability AI solution architects

to really implement image
models that are safe
and also reliable for our students.

The impact that Amazon Bedrock
has had in our business is
to be able to leverage AI to
increase the speed of implementation.

We were able to deploy
our Legend Library product
and just under six months,
and the images were accurate,
illustrations were rich in detail,

and we wanted to also
provide a safe environment
for our students using AI.
